name: ben-am
description: Alexa skill + web app that lets friends pick your wake-up music and record personalized DJ messages.
author: Ben Ma <ben@benma.dev>

scripts.install:all: cd backend/alexa-skill && npm install && cd ../api && npm install && cd ../youtube-dl && npm install && cd ../../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:backend: cd backend/alexa-skill && npm run build && cd ../api && npm run build && cd ../youtube-dl && npm run build
scripts.deploy:infra: cd infra && terraform init && terraform apply -auto-approve
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules backend/*/node_modules frontend/node_modules infra/node_modules backend/*/dist frontend/dist frontend/build
